features: 1.[Long Handled And Extension Pole] You can choose the length of the broom according to the height of the child or adult.Makes you more comfortable and sweeps the floor without bending over.

2.[2024 New Design] The broom with dustpan combo built in scraper and comb teeth can easily scrape off garbage and hair which on bristles of the broom into dustpan.And uniquely added dust cover, the hair of the broom is increased from three rows to four rows.
3.[Convenient storage save space] Broom snaps into dustpan for upright,You can keep your house clean and tidy.
4.[Good Quality] Broom and dustpan made from environmentally friendly recycled PET bottles and new ABS material, Make the it life longer.

5.[After sales service] Every customer will enjoy 60 days refund and replacement after-sales service.If you have any questions or problems during the using broom and dustpan, please contact us through storefront page"Ask a Question" immediately.We will solve the issue to your satisfaction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This New Version Indoor Broom With Dustpan Combo Set, With Long Handle And Extension Pole, Equipped With More Longer Length Scraper And Comb Let Hair On The Broom Delivered To The Dustpan More Easily! 1.Will you be troubled by tiny dust and little paper that is not obedient and does not into the pan ? 2.Do you feel sad because of the broom’s bristles ? 3.Does the height of the broom make you feel depressed? 4.When the broom is dirty or full of hair, and you don’t want to clean it by hands,What should you do? Our BROOM AND DUSTPAN can solve all your troubles ： 1.The dustpan of the broom and dustpan has a rubber lip that completely fit the ground and can easily capture tiny dust and little paper into the pan. 2.The broom of the broom and dustpan has flagged bristles resulting in a larger surface area and a soft ,but it does not up warp . 3.The long handle of the broom and dustpan allows you to Stands upright for comfortable sweeping. 4.The teeth of the dustpan so that you can get rid of dirty on the broom without using your hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It’s very easy to assemble and saves time. I appreciate the sturdiness of the product and note that it' s well made and reliable. I like that the rake is compact and easy to store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: After using the blue Broom and Dustpan Set for some time, I have found it to be a reliable and effective cleaning tool. The broom's bristles are stiff enough to pick up dirt and debris, yet gentle enough to avoid scratching floors or surfaces. The dustpan is also well-designed, with a wide mouth that makes it easy to sweep debris into the pan.One minor drawback of this set is that the broom handle sometimes is loose and has to be readjusted which can make it uncomfortable to use for extended periods of time. However, this is a minor issue that can be easily remedied using the broom in shorter intervals.Overall, I would rate this blue Broom and Dustpan Set as a solid 4 out of 5 stars. It gets the job done effectively and is a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could use a bit more power. Does not work with carpets.
reviews.reviewText: The long handles are great, no bending over and hurting my back. The angle of the broom makes it easy to get into corners and under furniture.It’s not the most powerful broom set I've used, especially with heavier debris – it could use a bit more oomph. But for everyday dust and bits on the floor, it does the job. And it stands up on its own, which is super convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Winning Duo for a Spotless Home: Dustpan and Broom
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this dustpan and broom set, and let me tell you, it has completely transformed my cleaning routine! With their exceptional quality and thoughtful design, these cleaning essentials have become my trusted partners in maintaining a spotless home. Allow me to share my delightful experience with this remarkable dustpan and broom duo.The dustpan and broom set is relatively lightweight, making it easy to handle and maneuver around different areas of the house. Cleaning up after use is a breeze, as the dustpan can be easily emptied with a simple flip of the handle. This feature saves time and eliminates the need to touch the collected dirt, promoting hygiene.In terms of durability, both the dustpan and broom have held up well during my use. They have proven to be sturdy enough to withstand regular cleaning tasks without showing signs of wear and tear. I appreciate the long-lasting quality of this set, as it ensures that I won't need to replace them anytime soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed a set for the apartment
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and does the job. Sturdy. Useable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't stand up on it own like I would have liked it to. But it gets the job done. No problem with sweeping and emptying the dust pan. Just a reminder you will have to let it lean onto the wall. Still worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars But it. Does what it says.
reviews.reviewText: Broom and dustpan set works well. My mom has one. When I moved into my own place I compared it to the flimsy ones at my local Walmart and Target and this one was better. It's lightweight but sturdy. The broom stick can be adjusted to a shorter length if desired. I oped to take one pole off of the dustpan for ease of use. The rubber on the pan keeps it flat so dirt sweeps right in. The bristles spread wide and the teeth is a great addition for those of us with long hair. It stands upright on its own too. I do have to tighten the threads form time to time and may put some glue. Otherwise, I might buy another one to use outdoors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dustpan stands up nicely. Broom bristles are kinda flimsy, handle is a little on the short side.I bought this for the dustpan with the teeth mostly. Works great for getting hairs unstuck from the broom as intended.
Low quality broom. Bought after seeing the high reviews, but the broom is too short, and the dustpan is not effective. Stick with the old style brooms!

Product is good but I didn't get the color blue and the handle is not long as mentioned in Product discription, I used it immediately to check and ones used you should not return . Though the quality is good I shall manage . But Product should be as described.
The product is average and does the job. The pickup pan is bit weird to clean rest ok
